content.rendered:
Directed by Anil Sharma

Written by Anil Sharma. Sunil Sirvaiya. Amjad Ali

Cast Utkarsh Sharma (Vasudev Shastri (Vasu / Genius)). Ishita Chauhan (Nandini Chouhan). Mithun Chakraborty (Jai Shankar Prasad). Ayesha Jhulka (Nandini’s Mother). Nawazuddin Siddiqui (MRS (Mr Samar Khan)) . Vikrant Antil ((credit only)). Malti Chahar (RAW agent). Hemant K Gaur (Assistant (as Hemant k Gaur)). Dev Gill (Rajiv ranjan). Zakir Hussain (Minister). Muni Jha (Pujari Baba). Rajiv Kachroo (Jason). Ehsan Khan (ISI Chief). K.K. Raina (Das). Ashok Samarth (Arjun Rathod). Satish Sharma (Satish Sharma). Abhimanyu Singh (Praveen Joshi).Ravindra Singh. Dharmatma Suryavanshi (Irfan). Luv Vispute (justin (IIT Student))

Language Hindi. English

Producers Harsh Dave. Hetvi Karia. Deepak Mukut. Kamal Mukut. Yashasvi Pandey. Sunil Sharma

Production Anil Sharma Production. Soham Rockstar Entertainment
